scripts.patch: (npm version patch --no-git-tag-version) & (git add -A && git commit -m "[RELEASE][PATCH] %npm_package_name%@%npm_package_version%")&(git tag -a v%npm_package_version% -m "v%npm_package_version%")
scripts.minor: (npm version minor --no-git-tag-version) & (git add -A && git commit -m "[RELEASE][MINOR] %npm_package_name%@%npm_package_version%")&(git tag -a v%npm_package_version% -m "v%npm_package_version%")
scripts.major: (npm version major --no-git-tag-version) & (git add -A && git commit -m "[RELEASE][MAJOR] %npm_package_name%@%npm_package_version%")&(git tag -a v%npm_package_version% -m "v%npm_package_version%")
scripts.publish2npmrepo: npm install & (echo Publishing... %npm_package_name%@%npm_package_version% to %(npm_registry_name%) & npm publish & (echo Uploaded %npm_package_name%@%npm_package_version%)
